title: Boys Keep Swinging
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Heaven loves ya
The clouds part for ya
Nothing stands in your way when you're a boy
Clothes always fit ya
Life is a pop of the cherry
 when you're a boy
[Pre-Chorus]
(When you're a boy) 
You can wear a uniform
(When you're a boy) 
Other boys check you out
(You get a girl) These are your favorite things
When you're a boy
[Chorus]
Boys
Boys
Boys keep swinging
Boys always work it out
[Verse 2]
Uncage the colours, unfurl the flag
Luck just kissed you hello
When you're a boy
They'll never clone you, 
you are always first on the line
When you're a boy

[Pre-Chorus]
(When you're a boy) You can buy a home of your own
(When you're a boy) Learn to drive and everything
You'll get your share
When you're a boy
[Chorus]
Boys
Boys
Boys keep swinging
Boys always work it out
[Guitar Solo]
